website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a powerful blender with a standard design, this is the NutriBullet to get.
pros: Delivers 1,200 watts of power with cyclonic action, making it capable of performing numerous meal-prep tasks
cons: Although rare, some lemons have been reported

customer_reviews.title: Chews up ice easily
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to try this blender with big ice cubes, thinking I should probably have crushed ice in there instead but, no problem, it handled the big ice easily. I've been making protein smoothies and all kinds of different smoothies on a daily basis. I've had it for about a week or so and I will update after I had it for about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best blender ever! I own a waring that costs more than double but I think the nutribullet is better. I’m going to buy another as a gift to my sister for the holidays!! I don’t review a lot but the feedback from others was very helpful in my decision to purchase this blender. If you are researching for a blender please don’t hesitate. This is one is great!!
customer_reviews.author: MMasiA

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Likes: -Blends really well even with a solids-heavy smoothie. At one point it overheated, though to be fair I was literally smashing my ingredients down with the lid. Overload protection feature works well. Dislikes: -There is a burnt plastic odor that come from the motor no matter if it's loaded down or not. It may decay over time. -The way the pitcher is molded it has indentions that look like diffusers or something on all four corners. Because of this, at times solids will get trapped on the sides and you have to shut it down and scrape them off. Over all I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks oil both inside and outside container
customer_reviews.text: Terribly flawed blender. Purchased 6 months ago and now leaks oil (not sure if this is from blade or motor, or both). It appears that whatever is leaking on outside also gets into what you are blending as well. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Harriet Nelson

customer_reviews.title: It works Great and is Fast
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it didn't take much time at all to blend food. Makes Great smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Franzen

customer_reviews.title: Powerful!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this! Has lots of power! I use it all the time! I'm so glad my little NutriBullet quit on my -- and now I have this! Love, Love, Love it! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: JRL

customer_reviews.title: Buy this, you’ll love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This this is KILLER! Crushes ice like no other blender I’ve owned. The actually blender base is much bigger than i thought- thankfully it fits on my counter. No complaints- buy this thing! You’ll love it
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Takes Too Much Effort
customer_reviews.text: I thought having a higher wattage would make this more powerful. I also thought the blunt blades did a better job at chopping and blending than sharp blades. My old 900 Watt Ninja with sharp blades does a much better job. This blender takes forever to make smoothies as it does not blend ice well. It requires a lot of liquid, which dilutes the recipe. It's a frequent stop and chunk effort. If you're trying to make an on-the-run smoothie, forget about it. The suction feet makes it difficult to slide in and out from underneath the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Merrie A. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Died after five months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blender in Feb of 2020 and on Aug 5, 2020 the motor died. It would also cause my smoothies to be warm sometimes which doesn’t taste good. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: MoosesMom

customer_reviews.title: Not the best design for smoothies
customer_reviews.text: Power-wise, this is no better than a regular blender. I like the design and the ease of use but I think it needs a faster high speed button and a redesign on the pour spout. Two issues: 1. Even running on high for several minutes, I find unpleasant chunks of frozen berries or ginger in smoothies that I never found with the 1200 watt, bullet-shaped nutribullet. 2. The pour spout is very wide for reasons I can't figure out and every time I pour something from the blender to different container, some of the liquified content drips onto the counter. Every time! This could be a great product but it needs some redesign. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Denis S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for smoothies.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for smoothie making. I use it on frozen solid fruit all the time and it doesnt have a problem. Only three speeds and a power button, super easy to use. Comes with a tamper stick that is perfectly made to put through the top and mash things down without hitting the blades. Very handy and not something I have seen before. It could possibly be easier to clean at the bottom, but the materials seems to allow everything to wash right off with minimal effort.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Do not store or use on quartz countertops without something under the suction cups!
customer_reviews.text: High powered blender that does the job. I love that the blade assembly does NOT detach like most blenders as they are a pain to clean with so many parts. That said, it is difficult to clean underneath the blades but I'll except that trade off any day. Con: We just had quartz countertops installed and the suction cups on this blender WILL leave circular rings that won't easily come out except with this wonderful product I found called "Bar Keepers Friend" which was a life saver. I now sit the blender on a paper plate when in use or not.
customer_reviews.author: Hopie

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly Incapable of Making Smoothies
customer_reviews.text: Incredible rip off of $100- if you’re hoping to use ice or frozen fruit in it (primary ingredients to put in a blender ...right?) this is NOT the device for you. I put ONE ice cube in after days of unsuccessful blending and yep, It jams it right up. As for frozen fruit I’ve tried every combination of What to put in first, using the masher while blending, etc, and in the end I always have to stop it, open it up, and repeatedly jam a knife into the concealed glob of frozen fruit in the center. Maybe it’s just me, but I feel that after paying a good chunk of money for a blender, the blender should... blend
customer_reviews.author: SweetlyBlessed

customer_reviews.title: More power but still no crushed ice!
customer_reviews.text: What is with the ice not crushing?! I even tried a frozen banana. Like someone mentioned they had to keep adding milk by that time your frozen drink is just not the right consistency. Definitely not soft serve! Going back.sadly
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pinorsky

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blender befor christmas and arrived on the 24th I was disappointed when we tried to use after xmas..the machine was defective...wtf
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: From very excited to very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this blender until washed it after the first use. There's a tiny gap around the inside perimeter of the base that traps small food particles. (You can see bright white coconut shavings in the photos I attached here.) The only thing I could find that would fit in that gap was the tip of a plastic toothpick. I tried to dig out the coconut particles with the toothpick, but I still could not get them out. I will be returning this blender because I don't want food particles building up in that gap, which can grow bacteria and mold.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a good blender to make protein drinks with. I didn't want to spend loads of money and when I saw the reviews and price I decided to get this one. It has worked great. I love the suction cups on the bottom to prevent the blender from moving while in use. It makes great smoothies and it's easy to clean. It reminds me of one of those heavy duty commercial grade ones. I have had mine for a while now and I make smoothies several times a week. It's held up great and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Barely Thirty Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great blender
customer_reviews.text: I am most happy with this new blender. My old Kitchen Aid blender, which used to be fairly highly rated, sounds like a freight train compared to this blender. I'm also not one of the people that report they make two smoothies a day, so I'm not a heavy user. But I think this blender is excellent for the money. It is relatively quiet, seems to have great power, and can mix up a smoothie with frozen elements very quickly. I did quiet a bit of research before the purchase and this blender has proven to be a good choice for me.
customer_reviews.author: wlc

customer_reviews.title: SÚPER EXCELLENT QUALITY !!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT !!!! I’m SO glad I did Not purchase the Vitamix because this NutriBullet is Just AMAZING!!!! Is super quite! Powerful !!! Super easy to use !!! Super easy to clean !!! It looks SO Profesional !!! The size is just perfect!! “immediately” You‘ll have "The Best juices WITHOUT THE NEED OF AN STRAINER! Definitively I’ll buy another one for my Mom ❤️ 1000% recomended!!! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️👌🏻👌🏻👌🏻
customer_reviews.author: Susana

customer_reviews.title: Amazing blender
customer_reviews.text: Amazing blender! Had a Ninja, replaced it with this model
customer_reviews.author: Motor City Madman

customer_reviews.title: Really a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I really hate that I spent so much on this. You have to make really big batches to hope to blend things. No matter how I try to adjust ratios and how long I blend it will not 100% blend everything. There's chunks. It's loud.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Blending Beast!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast! Works flawlessly! Makes short work of smoothies with frozen fruit even on low speed. Looking forward to trying a bunch of other items in it especially frozen drinks. Get it while it’s on sale, it’s a great buy compared to other high wattage blenders. Gonna recommend it to all our friends. We were using a regular kitchen blender for smoothies which barely have enough power, this one is miles ahead.
customer_reviews.author: G. Gaulin

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I really tried to like this, but I should have saved and bought a Vitamix. I am writing this because i just tried to make a smoothie with frozen banana, peanut butter and oatmilk. Even on high, even adding more and more milk, still huge chunks and would not blend. There is no way to achieve thick smoothie with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: E. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift and I love it. I use it make my own salad dressing. Smoothies and even soups. It won't start unless it's locked in place and has great power.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this blender for about 3 weeks now and it is AMAZING! I’ve only done smoothies so far.. but it blends my frozen fruit really well and quickly! I’ve also read that people were putting it in the dishwasher and the container cracking.. I’ve put mine in it twice and it hasn’t cracked or done any sort of damage! But I also just rinse the container and lid with super hot water right after I make a smoothie so I don’t have to wash it every time. I would recommend this blender!
customer_reviews.author: lakechelan93

customer_reviews.title: Terrible appliance
customer_reviews.text: Terrible appliance. Just 8 months after purchase, leaks started happening and it eventually stopped working. Very disappointed on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Blender Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This blender is fabulous! The blender cup is giant sized and I love that the top has vent holes for hot stuff. The motor is super strong and blended even huge frozen strawberries with no problem. It isn't anywhere near as noisy as I feared, either. I'd buy this blender again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for Smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I have always had Ninja blenders but they are pretty scarce since the lock down. This blender has been fantastic for smoothies. 1) Pitcher mouth is very wide and you don't have to stop the machine to add ingredients. 2) The blade design and the pitcher design work together to make the smoothie texture very very smooth and creamy. 3) No chunks of ice!!! 4) I still need to get the technique for making the pitcher properly seat on the base.
customer_reviews.author: 2driverpls

customer_reviews.title: wasnt as great as i thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: I feel like for how much i spent for this, it was all that amazing. to make smoothies, i have to use a lot of liquid for it to even turn my smoothie into an actual smoothie. kinda disappointed and wish i had done more research and ordered a different blender.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: PITCHER BLADE LOOSENS AFTER 6 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this! Pitcher blade loosens after 6 months causing motor smoking. Bought extended warranty. Won't need it. NUTRIBULLET said blades do loosen after 6-8 months of use. Sending a new pitcher to arrive in 3 weeks. Motor may be damaged, also. Usage was 3 - or 4 times a week to make smoothies with frozen sliced strawberries. NEVER used it with ice. A BIG disappointment in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this blender!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a good blender that didn't stop working after blending ice, frozen fruit for smoothies. I've had this blender a few months and have no complaints! You have to make sure to twist the blender all the way otherwise it wont turn on. Good blender for the price. I wish the blades could be removed to clean easier.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: The perfect purchase for me!
customer_reviews.text: Not the quietest blender around, but boy is it nice and powerful! It takes care of ice like a champ!! If you use a blender at least once or twice a week, upgrading to something like this makes a HUGE difference from a cheap walmart one!
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: An awesome blender! Honestly my last blender didn’t work very well even brand new, so I never blended anything. This one is quite the blender with several speeds and it blends very well. Enjoy it a lot
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and simple blender
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this product and how simple the buttons are. I just needed a powerful blender with little options. I would suggest looking at the dimensions because the blender was much bigger than what I was expecting, but so far that has come in use!
customer_reviews.author: Hefflinger

customer_reviews.title: Good Blender at a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! I have used it every day for the past month to make a protein shake in the morning. Zero hiccups or issues. Milk, Bananas, Peanut Butter, Ice cubes, all come out with milk-like consistency after about a minute of blending. Very easy to clean and you can see through the container to inspect the blades. Durability may be an issue as the container is plastic, but time will tell! I think it’s a great blender for the price either way.
customer_reviews.author: Mason Gage

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've had my share of mediocre blenders until I finally invested in this NutriBullet. I've had it for about six weeks now and I love it. I mainly work with frozen ingredients and the NutriBullet does what I want it to do. It's very powerful; so far I've only worked with the lowest blending level and it blends everything beautifully. Yes, a bit noisy and bulky (thankfully I have the counter space) but this comes with the territory. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: FFBB

customer_reviews.title: Blends up anything!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I ordered this blender over the vitamix. High quality, and blends/processes all the foods I was expecting (nuts, grains, dried & frozen fruits) going to rave about this blender too all my family and friends!
customer_reviews.author: Sanjit Toor

customer_reviews.title: Experience with the product
customer_reviews.text: When i turned on the button to grind, it didnt work. I got damaged piece. I am totally disappointed for buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Abirami

customer_reviews.title: So good my AIRBNB tenant stole it !
customer_reviews.text: The one time I did use it - I was blown away by the POWER ! The 1200 watts really go to town - Apparantly my tenant was impressed as well as the skanky individual stole it at check out !
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to clean
customer_reviews.text: The blades aren’t removable and as such cleaning can be tedious especially if you are making nut butter.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Williams-Vendor

customer_reviews.title: Blender
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice. Easy to use and clean. It lives up to its name. The only thing I was disappointed in was it did not come with one of the cups
customer_reviews.author: hasanni

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender
customer_reviews.text: I have had so many blenders and so far this one I am the most impressed with! Good power and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Fizzle

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: The blender is a little on the large size but it works great. All the power to blend anything you want. Nice Jar and lid to match. I'm sure it will last a long time. Very well made piece of kitchenware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother because we have one. She was delighted with it. I was trying to get my mother to avoid buying ready made soups. My mother was fully aware of the simplicity of the task of making fresh soups, she often did so. However, the Nutribullet blended the vegetables more thoroughly and the taste of the end result was far superior to a conventional blender.
customer_reviews.author: Kev Hill

customer_reviews.title: Powerful blender!
customer_reviews.text: Super powerful blender, and easy to clean! I have had this blender for more than 2 weeks and use it everyday for my aguas frescas and sauces. With my old blender, i would have to blend my food and after have to strain the food to take out any seeds or pieces that didn't blend. However, this blender made sure to even blend the tiny seeds! Great buy would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Esmeralda Morales

customer_reviews.title: love this blender
customer_reviews.text: i finally bought a different brand of blender - had stuck with kitchenaid for about a decade. this is a great blender, powerful and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: kristen meazell

customer_reviews.title: Works like they said it would.
customer_reviews.text: It's light weight, stays put on the counter unlike the last one that I had to watch because it often started to move across the counter. It blends everything I've tried. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: tomort1

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Just what everyone needs to process your fruit and veg. Very strong and well made. It has rubber on the bottom so it will not slip when it is on. This product is worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Joan Souto

customer_reviews.title: Basic Simplicity
customer_reviews.text: Good basic blender with no Fandango blades and programs. Big Blender jar wish it was sturdier plastic or glass but O.K.
customer_reviews.author: piouversa

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE IT! It mixes smoothies wonderfully. Ithas suction cups on the bottom so it sticks to the counter and doesn't slide around at all. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Janet G. Hayter

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Mixing ice and any fruits/vegetables. A bit not comfortable to "help" it with the special plastic stick but it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: Vladislav Goncharenko

customer_reviews.title: Great blender for smoothies.
customer_reviews.text: This blender made short work out of two cups of frozen mixed berries, half cup of yogurt and eight ice cubes. Smoothie came out great, cleanup was a snap and the price was right. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan M Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Overall it's a good machine.
customer_reviews.text: It's very tall. It just fit under my cabinets. My only objection is that it has suction feet and you can't slide it from under the cabinet. I solved this by attaching felt chair protectors to each foot. It is loud like most blenders but I use it every morning for a smoothie. It's a very efficient machine.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not retal packaging it looked counterfeit but it was what I ordered. It's less than my original nutribullet but more than a blender. I've had hard starts each time I've used it but it does work and is four times the size of the original. I hope it lasts as long.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Carlson

customer_reviews.title: A really powerfull blender.
customer_reviews.text: Great product with a very large blender container [64oz]. I use it for frozen drinks [margaritas and some others] and fruit smoothies. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Bert Loomis

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: I had to send it back. The box was all broken when I receive it and it didn’t work🤣
customer_reviews.author: agnes auffant

customer_reviews.title: Oh yeah recomend to a friends
customer_reviews.text: I give to my wife this item for her Mothers day but the only complain is the niose of the motor even if is on low speed.
customer_reviews.author: VICTOR LOPEZ

customer_reviews.title: My summer bff
customer_reviews.text: This thing is my new best friend. It blended greens, frozen fruit you name it, and it ran like a smooth motor not loud and obnoxious. I love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Amazing blender
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with this blender. I’ve never owned a top-tier blender like a Vitamix so I can’t really compare, but I can’t imagine needing anything more. It’s so easy to use, to assemble & disassemble, and to clean. Construction is solid, and it comes with a plunger to push ingredients down. It’s very loud and I suppose that might factor into a purchasing decision, but it makes no difference to me.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Childress

customer_reviews.title: Nice in all the right places..
customer_reviews.text: This blender is a perfect for my life..style. personally and professionally speaking. The weight, cup capacity, the suction feet keep it in place and price. Kudos..
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: 1000% Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Just used it after having it for 3 days. The bullet worked 1000% powderful than any blender I’ve had. Worth the price. Just took no time
customer_reviews.author: JAMAICA

customer_reviews.title: Love this Blender - Wish it was easier to clean
customer_reviews.text: I use this almost every day for smoothies and I just wish that it was easier to clean the blades / lid. I always have to clean it right away or it's a complete pain.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Y.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I am so far happy with my blender. I was in desperate need of a new blender and this one has definitely been a great replacement from my old one. It isn’t terribly loud and blends well. Cleaning is pretty simple. I use it just about everyday and I’m happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Van V

customer_reviews.title: A powerhouse
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast....I only made one shake in it but it liquified all the ingredients. No grains or granules. Smooth as silk. Cant wait to make more shakes
customer_reviews.author: robert r

customer_reviews.title: We love the blender
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and he uses it every day to juice and make smoothies. It’s easy to clean and the power of it is amazing. It’s not AS loud as most blenders but it is still a blender so it does make some noise. Overall, great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: This blender works so nicely. It is powerful and easy to use. Plus it was offered in easy pay.
customer_reviews.author: Helenm

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Physically this blender is big. It's also very powerful but not really that loud. Very easy to use and easy to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Conway

customer_reviews.title: Good blender
customer_reviews.text: It's a good one overall, but I just wished the bottom part of the blender also came off so I can clean it thoroughly .
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waisted your money
customer_reviews.text: Blades are horrible. I could barely make a smoothie with the frozen fruit
customer_reviews.author: Angelique huntsman

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I use this for mostly smoothies and blending down some herbs and this works great! I’ve had no problems yet!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: candidly, a decent blender but truly no better than my Hamilton Beach that cost $35- in my opinion, not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: CashBox

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool.
customer_reviews.text: He is the best of those that I was looking for up to $ 100 !!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for smoothies Blends evenly, fast and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Begimai

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressive Blending Power!
customer_reviews.text: My old NutriBullet finally kicked the bucket, so I had to purchase a new unit. I've been using this for a few months now and I am so impressed at how smooth my drinks are! To be honest, it is a little loud, but it does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Crushes ice very well. I have used it for all types of smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: YRM

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job.
customer_reviews.text: We have used this blender multiple times since getting it and it works great. Simple and easy to use and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great! My teenager uses it every day to make his shakes. It cuts ice easily and frozen fruits. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Zenn-Mixson

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Eating
customer_reviews.text: Comes with recipe booklet and SUPER cool! Best on market🥳
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa Jenelle

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's a heavy duty, easy to use blender/extractor. I find it relatively easy to clean. Make smoothies every day. Like the fact that I can buy replacement parts and accessories for it.
customer_reviews.author: Helga Knode

customer_reviews.title: Powerfull and large... almost like Vitamix
customer_reviews.text: Love this nutibullet. Container is large unlike other nutribullets; powerful machine. I use it everyday.. sometimes more than once.
customer_reviews.author: Abe R.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It only has 4 settings and 3 of the 4 are basically the same. Will not blend small amounts...only good for larger amounts. Works well otherwise but for the price point, I think I could have found something WAY better.
customer_reviews.author: lindsey g

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love it finally find something to mix my shake very well
customer_reviews.author: Marek

customer_reviews.title: Semi satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Item received. Hover I blundered in my order. I needed a blender that has a grating feature. I was going to return it ,but choose instead to order one with the feature I require. Will do so at a later time. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Errol v.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This blender is the bomb! Works so well and is easy to clean. Since the blades do not come out there is no leaking. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping, wonderful product! Huge upgrade from old standard blender lol.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette Perez

customer_reviews.title: noise
customer_reviews.text: noisy as all get out, probably could use it to scare burglars away
customer_reviews.author: nick kush

customer_reviews.title: Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected for making almond butter which was I bought it for. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: The best one I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I love how simple it is to use this NutriBullet. I blend my smoothie which contains frozen fruit, ice, milk, and fresh fruit on the low setting for a couple of seconds and it liquifies the drinks so quick.The power is incredible. It is worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Maira

customer_reviews.title: Loud!!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg it is soooo loud! Its like to have a helicopter inside the house hahahah. I returned this. I am sure i can find something better for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: its a powerful blender that makes the task easy and clean. Sturdy yet light weight. Like it very much. Haven't crushed ice. But for the rest, it works perfectly. Worth what it costs.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Great blender
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome for the money. It makes the best smoothies! It is amazing how quick it takes all the fruits and veggies into a liquid. Easy clean up!
customer_reviews.author: Ron S.

customer_reviews.title: Blends perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for Christmas. He uses it everyday he said. It's works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes the best smoothies
customer_reviews.text: This is a very strong Blender. It blends everything wonderfully including ice. Other blenders I had, didn’t ground the ice well. Very happy I have purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Shula Slagter

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Great blender. I love how my frozen margaritas turn out!
customer_reviews.author: tanis

customer_reviews.title: It's very good but  be careful to clean
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it works so good the only thing I don't like that I can not take out the blade from the base it it's hard to clean inside with blade
customer_reviews.author: Harshida Dave

customer_reviews.title: very powerful
customer_reviews.text: sometimes things get stuck, but love the plastic thing they provided to chop it up! very big and very NICE!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT BLENDER!
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Very easy to use. Super powerful. Easy to clean. Looks really sharp. Works very well. Exactly what we were looking for. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Awesome . I had a 600 waat nutribullet and love the one.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: SPARKED!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!! IT SPARKED AFTER A HANDFUL OF USES!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric G

customer_reviews.title: Smooth blend
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a good quality blender and this didn't disappoint. All my veggies very smoothly blended into silky drink. Awesome. 😁
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: NutriBullet ZNBF30400Z Blender 1200 Watts, 1200W, Dark Gray
product_meta.description: Style:BlenderReady to power up your kitchen? The NutriBullet blender is here for you. Get full control over any recipe with three blending speeds and a pulse function. Like it hot? The high-capacity, super-durable vented pitcher can handle warm soups, sauces, and hot stuff of all kinds, and makes multiple servings of your favorite creations for the whole family. And no NutriBullet would be complete without nutrient extraction. The pitcher’s redesigned blade and power base Work together to create the superfood smoothies your body craves, delivering key nutrients in every sip.
feature_bullets: NutriBullet blender is the ultimate cooking companion, with multiple speeds blend up any recipe, both quickly and precisely.
Three precision speeds, and pulse function offer you full control at the Press of a button. 1200W of power let you make an endless array of smoothies, soups, sauces, nut butters and beyond.
Includes: (1) 1200 watt motor base, (1) 64 oz blender pitcher with lid and vented lid cap, (1) Tamper, and (1) recipe book
The NutriBullet blender blade is made of powerful stainless steel and designed with cyclonic action. Our super-durable BPA-free pitcher is made of high-performance plastic.
Hassle-free cleaning - simply place pitcher in the dishwasher.
This item includes a 1 year Limited warranty.
Unit dimensions: 7.75 L x 8.07 W x 16.101
Note: Refer to user manual before use
Product built to North American & Canadian Electrical standards
